BuddyPress Courseware

Social LMS

  • WordPress.org Project
  • Support Forums
  • Project Handbook

BuddyPress is an open source social network project.
BuddyPress Courseware is a learning management system built to make teaching social again.
Also check out The Courseware Project we've open sourced in Nov 2013.

Buy the book from Packt Pub.
BuddyPress Courseware now is unmaintained, 2 years after the Google Summer of Code programme in 2010 and 2011 (accepted and mentored by WordPress and ScholarPress mentors).

  • Maintainer needed.

    BuddyPress Courseware is looking for a maintainer. Let us know if you are interested.

  • Latest Commits
